Package leitej.util

Class NetUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.util.NetUtil
  • public final class NetUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An useful class to help get information about the network.
    Author:
    Julio Leite

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.net.InetAddress getInetAdress​(java.lang.String hostName)
      Determines the IP address of a host, given the host's name.
      static java.net.InetAddress getLocalInetAdress()
      Returns the local host.
      If there is a security manager, its checkConnect method is called with the local host name and -1 as its arguments to see if the operation is allowed.
      static java.lang.String localHostAdress()
      Returns the IP address string in textual presentation.
      static java.lang.String localHostName()
      Gets the host name for this IP address.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInetAdress

        public static java.net.InetAddress getInetAdress​(java.lang.String hostName)
                                          throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                 java.net.UnknownHostException
        Determines the IP address of a host, given the host's name.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the specified host, or null
        Returns:
        an IP address for the given host name
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If no IP address for the host could be found, or if a scope_id was specified for a global IPv6 address
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and its checkConnect method doesn't allow the operation

      • getLocalInetAdress

        public static java.net.InetAddress getLocalInetAdress()
                                               throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Returns the local host.
        If there is a security manager, its checkConnect method is called with the local host name and -1 as its arguments to see if the operation is allowed. If the operation is not allowed, an InetAddress representing the loopback address is returned.
        Returns:
        the IP address of the local host
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If no IP address for the host could be found

      • localHostAdress

        public static java.lang.String localHostAdress()
                                        throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Returns the IP address string in textual presentation.
        Returns:
        the raw IP address in a string format
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If no IP address for the host could be found

      • localHostName

        public static java.lang.String localHostName()
                                      throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Gets the host name for this IP address.
        Returns:
        the host name for this IP address, or if the operation is not allowed by the security check, the textual representation of the IP address
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If no IP address for the host could be found
